entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 1:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
